name: Close (to) the Holes
description:
A game made for the Brackey Game Jam 2020.1

At first I didnt think i wouldnt find the time but here we are.
(the theme really motivated me)
The theme instantly gave me Made in Abyss vibes
(Made in Abyss is one of the best Animes / Mangas out there :)
I wish i had more than like 40 hours to work on the game (the time cant be truly calculated, much afk time because of family :)

So the basic thing: going down is the same. you have to go down and find out whats further down.

The Gam Jam version features:
A tutorial where you lern how to dash, jump, attack and move. And what stamina is.
1 normal Level
2 Enemies, 1 passive creature, a dummy and creates you can play around with. so in total 4 things to destroy
1 Bossfight :D Probably best part of this current game
6 Weapons (Knife, Wooden Sword, Metal Bat, Sword, Greatsword, Katana)

1 Easteregg for all the Made in Abyss Fans

(And because of lacking time because i had to travel a long distance in the jam time and other Real Life there is less textures in the game as i wanted)

Jam scratched Ideas that will be implemented if people like the idea of the game:
Polished levels, more decoratives and fancy stuff
- different boots for differen jumping, air jumping, anti gravity and so on
- artifacts that make you stronger
- obviously more levels
- deeper lore
- different kind of enemies
- Your suggestions
- Weapon types (different ranged, magic and close combat weapons)
- 3 difficultys (easy, normal and hard)
- ? curse of ascending (feels a bit stolen not inspired lol, maybe never do this)


Have Fun!
